text.config.effectual.title: Effectual Settings
text.config.effectual.option.bubbleBreat: Creates bubbles when breathing underwater, as long as the player has an oxygen supply.
text.config.effectual.option.bubbleChest: Bubbles occasionally rise from an open underwater chest.
text.config.effectual.option.caveDustFre: How often dust appears in caves (higher = more).
text.config.effectual.option.fireImprove: New spark particles from fire and soul fire.
text.config.effectual.option.campfireImp: New spark particles from campfires and soul campfires.
text.config.effectual.option.lanternImpr: New spark particles from lanterns and soul lanterns.
text.config.effectual.option.fireflySpaw: The spawn rate of fireflies (higher = more).
Adds visible breath steam in cold biomes.
text.config.effectual.option.dynamicBrea: If enabled, breathing (in cold biomes) speeds up when sprinting or jumping.
text.config.effectual.option.runDust.too: Creates additional dust particles when running on sand or snow.
text.config.effectual.option.fireEntityS: When an entity is on fire (e.g. in lava or flames), sparks will fly out of it.
text.config.effectual.option.minecartSpa: Sparks appear when minecarts move at high speed.
text.config.effectual.option.steamEffect: When water touches hot blocks (such as lava or a cauldron with lava), it creates a steam jet.
text.config.effectual.option.waterDrip.t: When the player exits water, droplets fall from them.
text.config.effectual.option.blockPlaceE: Particles appear when placing snow, sand, or gravel, matching the placed block.
If a decorated pot is underwater, it occasionally releases bubbles.
text.config.effectual.option.metalHitSpa: When hitting a metal block with a metal weapon or tool, sparks appear.
